code: import Blockly from'blockly/core';import'blockly/blocks';import{pythonGenerator}from'blockly/python';Blockly.Blocks['arrays_create']={init:function(){this.appendValueInput('VALUE').setCheck(null).appendField('create array with');this.setPreviousStatement(true,null);this.setNextStatement(true,null);this.setColour(160);this.setTooltip('Create an array with the given value');}};pythonGenerator.forBlock['arrays_create']=function(block){const value=pythonGenerator.valueToCode(block,'VALUE',pythonGenerator.ORDER_ATOMIC)||'[]';return`array = ${value}\n`;};
